creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Hanging of embroidered imperial yellow satin. Large design of twining lotus blossoms and leaves in satin stitch in shades of blue, green, pink, brick red, tan and yellow. At either side of center, figures of good luck gods in couched silk floss. Seamed up the middle. Lining of burnt orange silk of cloud design.
title: Panel
